amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the closure or abandonment of any facility located at Lajes Field, Azores, Portugal.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nunes amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Nunes.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nunes amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
